alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:01PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties. .Widespread flooding continues on area rivers as additional rainfall from tonight and into Friday will keep river flows increased. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Numerous roads flooded and impassable between the Minnesota River and Redwood Falls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 800 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 26.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 800 PM CDT Thursday was 26.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.8 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.3 feet on 03/25/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
